A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While I saw the original Star Wars as a young boy and carry some strong nostalgia for those first films\, I've never been a fanatical fan. That said\, the way Disney has destroyed beloved characters and mythology is cringe worthy. I feel terribly for the fans and especially Mark Hamill\, who is clearly devastated that his legacy as Luke Skywalker has been reduced to a steaming pile of humiliation. Beyond the vile disrespect toward past icons\, the film is simply awful ... with insane plot holes\, absurd characters who are impossible to like and/or care about\, and nonsensical twists on the Star Wars mythology that retroactively destroy the entire franchise. This movie is an epic fail.
